blocks.description: The inverse tangent of 48 equals the inverse tangent of 62.23, resulting in 31 degrees and 54 minutes.
Shows the sine of the difference of two inverse tangents.
A differential equation representing the relationship between variables.

blocks.text: Example 21. – The equation $\frac{d^{2}y}{dt^{2}} + F y + B \cos(\theta) = 0$ occurs in Mechanics; $\theta$ is the angle of a rod of length L, and b it the end load.
